pl_output:
NINTENDO! HIRE THIS MAN!
---------------------------

`NThere's a man who has artistic vision,`
`NHe's showing up Nintendo with each decision,`
`NHe makes it in a flash,`
`NAnd all the assets clash,`
`NDo his artistic skills know no boundaries?`

`FNintendo, hire this man,`
`FNintendo, hire this man,`
`FHe's using Unreal Engine in any way he can!`

`NTake Mario's model for the first step,`
`NAnd put him in a field filled with stock assets,`
`NThen adjust the lighting gain,`
`NAnd though it runs at 40 frames,`
`NThis man's still a master of the medium!`

`FNintendo, hire this man,`
`FNintendo, hire this man,`
`FHe's using Unreal Engine in any way he can!`

`NMake a model's textures look realistic,`
`NWith no regard for artstyle or the aesthetic,`
`NOh, crank the bloom and then,`
`NIt'll really look next gen,`
`NThis man truly is a FUCKING GENIUS!`

`FNintendo, hire this man,`
`FNintendo, hire this man,`
`FHe's using Unreal Engine in any way he can!`
